name: Tag WebinarJam Purchasers in KlickTipp
description:
This scenario tags contacts in KlickTipp based on whether they purchased a product during or after a WebinarJam session.

After fetching the registrant data, the scenario checks if a user made a purchase during the live event or after watching the replay. It then applies a corresponding tag in KlickTipp to help you segment and automate follow-ups.

It supports multiple webinars and assigns different tags for live buyers and replay buyers. This allows you to build targeted email sequences or track conversions more effectively.

The scenario is useful for sales webinars, product launches, or any campaign where you want to follow up differently with buyers depending on when they made their purchase.
